\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{datachange.persistence.keepevents.millis}
\label{configuration:DatachangePersistenceKeepeventsMillis}
\ClearAPI
The time in ms which datachange events should not be removed. After the time has expired the events are removed from the database. Valid values are all numbers > 0 and -1, whereas -1 means the events are stored forever. This property takes only effect if the DataChangePersistentModule (\ref{module:DataChange}) is loaded.

\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{datachange.persistence.keepevents.millis}}]
